A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worst movie ever!  Disgrace to the Star Wars series.  Ignores all previous Star Wars history and destroys the character traits of legacy characters.  Major issues in the actual movie making process including massive holes in the script without explanation\, bad comedy not in line with the Star Wars universe shoehorned into many area's.  One good thing I can say is the visual's were 1st class.  Easily the worst Star Wars\,  I rank the Star Wars Xmas Episode as better than this - at least that story stayed with-in the Star Wars universe and stayed true to the characters.... and a better storyline too!
